page.title: 11LOCAL INDUSTRIES IN WITHYHAM
page.content:
Although this is largely a rural area there are a number of small industries including a garage, a nursery, an independent slaughterhouse and a signmaker. Mr. Donald, father of Jamie (page 9), has been running his own motor repair business for 14 years. In a normal week he will work on about 15 cars, using just Â£2000 worth of equipment. He does not advertise and works completely on his own. He works on a small number of commercial vehicles but has no company contracts. The most common repairs undertaken by him are clutch and brake replacements.
Read more about the Donald family on page 9.
